SELECT C.날짜 AS week , NVL(SUM(A.횟수), 0) AS walk, nvl(sum(B.횟수),0) as sale from (select to_char(WALK_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as 산책일, count(*) 횟수 from WALK where WALK_DATE >=(SYSDATE-7) and WALK_DATE < SYSDATE group by to_char(WALK_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') order by 산책일 ) A, (select to_char(PAY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as 판매일, count(*) 횟수 from PAY where PAY_DATE >=(SYSDATE-7) and PAY_DATE < SYSDATE group by to_char(PAY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') order by 판매일 ) B, ( select to_char(SYSDATE - (LEVEL - 1), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as 날짜 from dual connect by level <= 7 ) C where C.날짜 = A.산책일(+) and C.날짜 = B.판매일(+) group by C.날짜 order by C.날짜

select a.walk, b.sale, c.point from (select member_number as num, count(*) as walk from (select * from WALK where MEMBER_NUMBER=#{member_number}) a group by member_number) a, (select member_number as num, count(*) as sale from (select * from pay left join orderlist on orderlist.order_code = pay.order_code where member_number=#{member_number}) group by member_number) b, (select member_number as num, pet_walkpoint as point from pet_mypage where member_number=#{member_number}) c, (select member_number as num from member where member_number=#{member_number}) d where d.num = a.num(+) and d.num = b.num(+) and d.num = c.num(+)
select ROWNUM, a.* from (select * from WALK where WALK_DATE>SYSDATE order by WALK_DATE)a where ROWNUM>0 and ROWNUM<=8
select ROWNUM, a.* from (select * from WALK where WALK_DATE<SYSDATE order by WALK_DATE desc)a where ROWNUM>0 and ROWNUM<=8
select A.* from (select * from BOARD where BOARD_IDX=5) A left join (select * from BOARD_CMT where BOARD_IDX=5) B on A.POST_IDX = B.POST_IDX where B.POST_IDX is null

select ROWNUM, a.*, b.* from BOARD a , BOARD_CMT b where
(POST_WRITER like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or POST_SUBJECT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or CONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or CMT_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') and
a.POST_IDX = b.POST_IDX and a.BOARD_IDX=5 and b.BOARD_IDX=5 and ROWNUM>0 and ROWNUM<=5

select a.member_number, a.count, b.recent, c.jcount from (select member_number, count(*) count from walk group by member_number) a, (select max(walk_date) recent from walk where walk_date<SYSDATE) b, (select count(*) jcount from walk_join left join walk on (walk.walk_idx = walk_join.walk_idx)) c where member_number = #{member_number}

select a.member_number, member_name from (select member_number, count(*) total from walk group by member_number order by total desc) a left join member on (a.member_number = member.member_number) where ROWNUM>0 and ROWNUM<=5

select ROWNUM, value.* from (select a.*, b.recent, c.jcount from (select walk_location, count(*) count from walk group by walk_location) a, (select walk_location, max(walk_date) recent from walk group by walk_location) b, (select walk.walk_location, count(*) jcount from walk_join left join walk on (walk.walk_idx = walk_join.walk_idx) group by walk.walk_location) c where a.walk_location = b.walk_location(+) and a.walk_location = c.walk_location(+) and b.recent is not null order by a.count desc) value where ROWNUM>0 and ROWNUM<=5

select ROWNUM,a.product_code, a.count, b.product_name from (select product_code, count(product_code) count from orderlist group by product_code order by count desc) a inner join (select product_code, product_name from product) b on a.product_code = b.product_code where ROWNUM >= 0 and ROWNUM <= 5

select ROWNUM, a.member_number, a.member_name, b.product_name, a.member_address, c.pcount, c.pay_method, d.login_date ,a.ordersu_name from (select * from orderlist natural join (select * from member natural join ordersu)) a, (select product_code,product_name from product) b, (select ROWNUM pcount, order_code, pay_method from pay) c, (select member_number, login_date from login_log) d where a.product_code = b.product_code and a.order_code = c.order_code(+) and a.member_number = d.member_number and ROWNUM >= 0 and ROWNUM <= 5

select aa.member_name, bb.product_name, pay.pay_totalpay, pay.pay_date, pay.pay_address, pay.pay_method from pay, ( select orderlist.order_code, orderlist.member_number, orderlist.product_code, m.member_name from orderlist left join member m on orderlist.member_number = m.member_number(+) ) aa, (select * from product) bb where pay.order_code = aa.order_code and aa.product_code = bb.product_code
